content.rendered: A range of controls that drive down cost and takes user friendliness to a new level with a new smartphone app, that simplifies design, installation, service and use.

excerpt.rendered: A range of controls that drive down cost and takes user friendliness to a new level with a new smartphone app, that simplifies design, installation, service and use.
